Headline: #90 Harlem Temporary Reroute at Harlem/Palmer
ShortDescription: 90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Grand, Oak Park, North Avenue, and Harlem due to, street blockage at Harlem/Palmer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Harlem, Grand, Oak Park, North Avenue, and Harlem due to, street blockage at Harlem/Palmer.

Allow extra travel time.
